data.name: Warface - Weapon set "Icebreaker"
data.detailed_description:
About the "Icebreaker" set


The weapons from the "Icebreaker" series are made from an unknown material and have a bright appearance, while their technical characteristics remained unchanged in comparison to their regular versions - the guns will still help you quickly deal with any enemy. Be sure to use gloves — the steel is as cold as Ursula's heart!



The weapons have a unique appearance and animations — they glow in the dark, creating a cloud of white frost around them.



The set includes four ice models — one for each class: "Rifleman", "Medic", "Engineer" and "Sniper".

M16A3 Custom "Icebreaker"

This legendary rifle is the go-to of a professional Rifleman. Distinguished by its high damage of 82 units and malleable recoil. Also, the weapon has good range and high accuracy, allowing you to shoot comfortably at any distance.


Fabarm STF 12 Compact "Icebreaker"

The shotgun has excellent damage and a high rate of fire, which allows you to quickly wipe out the enemy. Its excellent range provides great damage from both short and middle distances. The weapon can be reloaded with a single cartridge at a time and has up to 6 cartridges in the magazine.


Honey Badger "Icebreaker"

The submachine gun is considered to be a versatile weapon that perfectly deals with any task assigned to it. Compact, dynamic, pleasant to handle — all this perfectly characterizes the Honey Badger. It is equipped with an integrated silencer, which allows you to fire while always remaining unnoticed. The magazine holds 30 rounds, which are quickly used up by the enormous rate of fire.


Steyr Scout "Icebreaker"

This legendary sniper rifle is characterized by its enormous damage, which is balanced by its low range. There are three attachment slots for the modification with a wide variety of available devices. Among them are two exclusives for this weapon attachment: a silencer and a bipod, which can be easily adapted for an active gameplay style and more precise actions. Steyr Scout is easy to use but requires more attention.



Of course, by using this weapon, you can earn a lot of achievements.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The set includes four powerful and colorful guns from the "Icebreaker" series. Use with caution: these models are ice cool!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
